tool_description: Given a text, extracts actionable insights, and creates tasks for them, which are kind of a work item.

arguments.name: text
arguments.description: The text from which the actionable insights need to be created.

tool_description: Automates repetitive workflow tasks by defining triggers and actions.

arguments.name: trigger_event
arguments.description: The event or condition that triggers the workflow

arguments.name: workflow_actions
arguments.description: The actions to be executed when the trigger event occurs

arguments.name: notifications
arguments.description: Specifies who should receive notifications when the workflow is triggered

arguments.name: actions_log
arguments.description: Keeps a log of actions performed by the workflow for auditing
